definitions.title: n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: son of Abraham and Keturah Ge 25:2, Ge 25:4 (J) 1Ch 1:32, 1Ch 1:33.

an Arabian tribe Ge 36:35 (= 1Ch 1:46) Nu 31:3, Nu 31:3, Nu 31:7, Nu 31:8, Nu 31:8, Nu 31:9 (P) Ju Jdg 6–Jdg 9 (31 t.); having a [[כּׂהֵן]] (as chieftain?) Ex 2:16, Ex 3:1, Ex 18:1 (E); [[זקנים]] Nu 22:4; Nu 22:7 (JE), ([[ים]])[[נשׂיא]] Nu 25:18 (P) Jos 13:21 (P), [[שׂרים]] Ju Jdg 7:25, Jdg 8:3, [[מלכים]] Nu 31:8, Nu 31:8, Ju Jdg 8:5, Jdg 8:12, Jdg 8:26; [[בִּכְרֵי מִדְיׇן]] dromedaries of Midian Is 60:6; [[יוֹם מִדְיׇן]] day of Midian Is 9:3 (the victory over Midian Ju Jdg 7–Jdg 8) cf. Is 10:26, Ps 83:10,

[[אֶרֶץ]] [[מִרְיׇן]] the land of Midian Ex 2:15 (E) Hb Hab 3:7; [[מִדְיׇן]] Ex 4:19 (J) Nu 25:15 (P) 1Ki 11:18; land on Ælanitic gulf (where Arab. geographers still place town mdyn). Cf. on Midian, Glaser:Skizze ii. 447 ff.; Hom:Aufsätze i. (l892), 4f.
